channel.title: Kde on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Kde on Arrans github.io

item.title: shvedes/awesome-kde
item.description: A curated list of awesome KDE applications, plugins, and resources

item.title: ChocolateLoverRaj/rust-fp
item.description: Fingerprint library, dbus interface, CLI, and PAM module for unlocking Linux with fingerprint sensors. Currently for Chromebooks.

item.title: arran4/kde-keyboard-shortcuts
item.description: A quick and simple installer for my kde keyboard bindings in system, as a deb/rpm file

item.title: Intika-KDE-Plasmoids/plasmoid-ultimate-gmail-feed
item.description: Plasma 5 plasmoid showing your gmail feed (based on anthon38/gmailfeed)

item.title: JunoNgx/kde-currently-playing
item.description: A minimal media info widget for KDE Plasma
